alert.note: Alert for Elko (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 1:29PM PDT until further notice by NWS Elko
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Nevada... Bruneau River At Rowland affecting Elko County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Bruneau River At Rowland. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Moderate flooding. Impacts undetermined. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:10 PM PDT Sunday the stage was 8.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:10 PM PDT Sunday was 9.0 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 130 AM PDT.
